summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Friday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 3
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Friday, with two gaining and the other 17 declining.
Bitcoin fell 2% to $23,357 by market close.
